item.title: Sara add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sara add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sara add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sara add a quote by Theodore Roosevelt
item.description: "Do what you can, with what you have, where you are." -- Theodore Roosevelt

item.title: Sara add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Finish each day and be done with it. You have done what you could. Some blunders and absurdities no doubt crept in; forget them as soon as you can. Tomorrow is a new day. You shall begin it serenely and with too high a spirit to be encumbered with your old nonsense." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Sara add a quote by Paul Terry
item.description: "Whenever I feel the need to exercise, I lie down until it goes away." -- Paul Terry

item.title: Sara add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I don't know the question, but sex is definitely the answer." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Sara add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "The difference between sex and love is that sex relieves tension and love causes it." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Sara add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Good sex is like good bridge. If you don't have a good partner, you'd better have a good hand." -- Mae West

item.title: Sara add a quote by Lily Tomlin
item.description: "We have reason to believe that man first walked upright to free his hands for masturbation." -- Lily Tomlin

item.title: Sara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Loyalty to country ALWAYS. Loyalty to government, when it deserves it." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sara add a quote by Shane MacGowan
item.description: "People are talking about immigration, emigration and the rest of the fucking thing. It's all fucking crap. We're all human beings, we're all mammals, we're all rocks, plants, rivers. Fucking borders are just such a pain in the fucking arse." -- Shane MacGowan

item.title: Sara add a quote by Edward Abbey
item.description: "Our 'neoconservatives' are neither new nor conservative, but old as Babylon and evil as Hell." -- Edward Abbey

item.title: Sara add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sara add a quote by E.B. White
item.description: "After all, what's a life, anyway? We're born, we live a little while, we die." -- E.B. White

item.title: Sara add a quote by Fran Lebowitz
item.description: "There is no such thing as inner peace. There is only nervousness and death." -- Fran Lebowitz

item.title: Sara add a quote by Epicurus
item.description: "Death, therefore, the most awful of evils, is nothing to us, seeing that, when we are, death is not come, and, when death is come, we are not." -- Epicurus

item.title: Sara add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "All this happened, more or less." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Sara add a quote by M. T. Anderson
item.description: "We went to the moon to have fun, but the moon turned out to completely suck." -- M. T. Anderson

item.title: Sara add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I did not marry the first girl that I fell in love with, because there was a tremendous religious conflict, at the time. She was an atheist, and I was an agnostic." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Sara add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "I was the captain of the latent paranoid softball team. We used to play all the neurotics on sunday morning. Nailbiters against the bedwetters, and if you've never seen neurotics play softball, it's really funny. I used to steal second base, and feel guilty and go back." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Sara add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Sara add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Sara add a quote by Michael Pollan
item.description: "Eat food. Not too much. Mostly plants." -- Michael Pollan

item.title: Sara add a quote by Alice May Brock
item.description: "Tomatoes and oregano make it Italian; wine and tarragon make it French. Sour cream makes it Russian; lemon and cinnamon make it Greek. Soy sauce makes it Chinese; garlic makes it good." -- Alice May Brock

item.title: Sara add a quote by Elizabeth Cady Stanton
item.description: "Woman's degradation is in mans idea of his sexual rights. Our religion, laws, customs, are all founded on the belief that woman was made for man." -- Elizabeth Cady Stanton
